#summary Release notes

Release Notes for My Tracks version 1.1.16
  * play track using the Google Earth mobile client
  * update GPX, KML, CSV, and TCX output format
  * add fractional seconds in location timestamp
  * periodically remove files in the SD card temp directory
  * only show the account picker when there is more than one account
  * use H:MM:SS format for elapsed time when sending to Google Docs
